{{< entity_summary >}}
The Government of Canada spent an estimated **\$2.0M in 2021-2022** on contracts with KASIAN ARCHITECTURE INTERIOR DESIGN.

Across 33 contracts active since the start of the 2017-2018 fiscal year, 18 have at least one amendment (55%). Of contracts with amendments, the average increase in dollar value was 124% and the average number of amendments was 1.78. Cumulatively these amendments represent an increase of \$4.3M over the original contract values.

The average contract duration was 1.98 years, and the average contract value (not including contracts under \$10k) was \$364.5K. The longest contract was 4.24 years. The largest contract by value (including amendments) was \$1.5M.

{{< /entity_summary >}}

- [Kasian Architecture Interior Design](https://search.open.canada.ca/en/ct/?sort=contract_value_f%20desc&page=1&search_text=%22Kasian%20Architecture%20Interior%20Design%22)
{{< /details >}}
